description.en: The day after he finds himself dumped by his girlfriend, Sorayama Shun recieves a letter… from himself? The letter was from Shun 25 years ago for his future self. The letter reminds him of the time when he dreamed of owning a Countach and being a successful professional racer. With loads of luck and his ambition to make his childhood dream come true, he finds himself as a new owner of an LP400 Countach.

title.en: Uchida-san wa Zettai ni Gyaru Janai!

altTitles.ja: 内田さんは絶対にギャルじゃない！

altTitles.en: Uchida-san Is Definitely Not a Gal

description.en:
A gyaru on the outside, but an otaku on the inside!?

Naruse Arata, an otaku who loves "Riri Gyaru", meets a girl who looks exactly like "Riri-chamu", a character from "Riri Gyaru", at the entrance ceremony of his high school! The excitement is short-lived, however, as the girl turns out to be Uchida Hina, a fellow otaku from the same middle school. After a lot of effort, Uchida-san has "visually" become Naruse-kun's favorite gyaru, and she's excited that she can finally go out with Naruse-kun, whom she's loved since middle school, but... what Naruse likes is a girl who's a gyaru on the "inside"...!

Can an otaku become a gyaru on the inside!?

A four-panel romantic comedy in which Uchida-san tries her best in love, but is "adorably futile"!
description.ja:
***見た目はギャルで中身は…オタク!?***

『リリギャル』が大好きなオタク・成瀬　新（なるせ　あらた）が高校の入学式に出会ったのは、『リリギャル』に登場するキャラクター「りりちゃむ」にそっくりな女の子！
ときめいたのも束の間、ギャルの正体は同じ中学のオタク仲間・内田雛（うちだ　ひな）だった。
壮絶な努力の末、成瀬くんの大好きなギャルに「見た目上」なりきった内田さんは、中学の時から好きだった成瀬くんとようやく付き合えると盛り上がるが…。
成瀬くんが好きなのは、「中身」がギャルの女の子だった──！

オタクは中身までギャルに染まることはできるのか!?
恋にがんばる内田さんが”空回りかわいい”４コマラブコメ！


* **成瀬新**
『リリギャル』に出てくるギャル・「りりちゃむ」が大好きな高校一年生のオタク。大事なのは見た目ではなくギャルなマインド。

* **内田雛**
中学時代から成瀬くんが好きで、成瀬くんの好きなギャルになって高校デビュー。中身はただのオタク。

altTitles.ja: ヤンキーとキャラメリゼ

description.en:
From 2nd Life Scans: Yasokawa Akito, a high schooler social media influencer, discovered that his classmate, Maki Naofumi, a yankee, was uploading photos of the sweets he had made, onto social media. Akito's influencer spirit is ignited, and he manages to persuade Maki, who is stubborn about not wanting anyone to find out, to shoot a video and publish it. Maki is cool when making sweets, and his face is cute when he gets embarrassed when Akito compliments him. Akito is happy to discover this unexpected side of Maki, but each time Maki releases a video, he gains new fans, and Akito becomes increasingly possessive of him even though they are friends.

One day, he sees Maki coming out of a hotel room with a guy...?!

We begin the story as Rock has left her husband, Astro, and their children and wants a divorce because Astro has cheated on Rock (again). As the five year old twins, Rockette and Astro Junior, find pictures of their parents when they were young, we flash back to the ever so popular romcom scenario of when Rock met Astro... except it's Kyoko Okazaki so it's messy, it's kooky, it's funny and it's all in a way that's unique to Kyoko Okazaki.
Between romantic comedy and hallucinated fairy tail, Kyoko Okazaki blows a wind of hysteria in the fashion world and its nights saturated with music and drugs.

title.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 8 - JoJolion (Official Colored)

altTitles.ja-ro: JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken: JoJolion

altTitles.en: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 8 - JoJolion - Digital Colored Comics

altTitles.es-la: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure, Parte 8 : JoJolion - Color Digital

altTitles.ru: Невероятные Приключения ДжоДжо Часть 8: Джоджолион (цветная версия)

altTitles.ja: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ジョジョリオン
ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 第8部 ジョジョリオン カラー版

description.en:
Eighth story arc of JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken series.  
  
Following the Great East Japan earthquake, Morioh has been stricken by vast earthen protrusions known by the locals as Wall Eyes. Despite investigation, professional estimations are left empty. Meanwhile, the young girl Yasuho Hirose discovers a man buried within the ground, he possesses a distinctive star-shaped birthmark together with deeply penetrating bite marks. The man, who has contracted a staple case of amnesia is taken in by a local family and given the name Jousuke Higashikata, however mysterious events cannot stop from piling one upon the other and soon that enigma known as stand emerges to complement the great cloud of confusion.  
  
- The monochrome version won the Grand Prize in the manga category at the 17th Japan Media Arts Festival in 2013.
description.hu:
A Jojo no Kimyou na Bouken sorozat nyolcadik történetíve.

A nagy japán földrengést követően Morioh-t hatalmas földkiugrások sújtották, ahogy helyiek nevezik, Szemes falak. A vizsgálat ellenére a szakmai becslések üresen maradtak. Eközben egy fiatal lány, Yasuho Hirose egy férfit talál a földbe temetve,aki jellegzetes csillagalakú anyajeggyel és mélyre hatoló harapásnyomokkal rendelkezik. A férfit, aki az aminézia jeleit mutatja, egy helyi család hozta ide és adta neki a Josuke Higashikata nevet, azonban a különös események nem maradnak abba, egyik a másikat halmozza leginkább és hamarosan a standként ismert talány előbukkan, hogy eloszlassa a zavarságok felhőit. 

- 2013-ban a 17-dik Japan Media Arts Festivalon megnyerte a fődíjat a manga kategóriában.
description.pl:
Ósma część serii JoJo's Bizarre Adventure. 
Począwszy od trzęsień ziemi w 2011, w miasteczku Morioh zaczęły występować rozległe uskoki, nazwane Murami Oczu. Pomimo przeprowadzonych badań, przyczyna ich wzniesienia pozostaje nieznana. W międzyczasie młoda dziewczyna imieniem Yasuho Hirose znajduje zakopanego mężczyznę ze znamieniem w kształcie gwiazdy otoczonym śladami ugryzienia. Mężczyzna przyjąwszy łatkę człowieka z amnezją, został przyjęty do mieszkającej w pobliżu rodziny oraz nadano mu imię - Jōsuke Higashikata. Jednakże, tajemnicze wydarzenia wcale nie ustają, a zagadkowe Standy dopełniają poczucie zdezorientowania.
- Czarno-biała wersja wygrała główną nagrodę w kategorii mangi w 17 edycji Japońskiego Festiwalu Sztuki w 2013 roku.
description.es-la:
El arco de la octava historia de la serie: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure.

Tras el gran terremoto del este en Japón, Morioh ha sido golpeado por grandes protuberancias de tierra conocidas por los lugareños como Los Muros con Ojos. A pesar de la investigación, las estimaciones profesionales quedan vacías. Mientras tanto, la joven Yasuho Hirose, descubre a un hombre enterrado en la tierra, este posee una distintiva marca de nacimiento en forma de estrella junto con marcas de mordeduras profundas. El hombre, que ha contraído un caso básico de amnesia, es acogido por una familia local y recibe el nombre de Jousuke Higashikata, sin embargo, los eventos misteriosos no pueden evitar que se acumulen unos sobre otros y pronto ese enigma conocido como "stand", emerge para complementar la gran nube de confusión.

° Ganó el Gran Premio en la categoría de manga en el 17º Festival de Artes de Medios de Japón en 2013.

description.en:
Kim Soohyuk, a veteran rescuer in Shinil-seo was crushed and killed during a rescue operation in a collapsing building.
Soohyuk, who thought he was dead, opened his eyes in an incident 10 years ago. [Save Everyone] He was able to save two people that he couldn't save in the past.
As a reward, he was also given new abilities and strength. "Great. From now on, I will save the lives of those I couldn't save in the past!"
description.pt-br: Kim Soohyuk, um socorrista veterano em Shinil-seo, foi esmagado e morto durante uma operação de resgate de um prédio em colapso. Soohyuk, que pensou estar morto, abriu seus olhos em um incidente de 10 anos atrás. [Salve Todos] Ele foi capaz de salvar duas pessoas que não tinha conseguido salvar em sua última vida. Como recompensa, lhe foi concedido novas habilidades e força. “Ótimo, a partir de agora, salvarei a vida daqueles que não consegui no passado!”

title.en: Fushigi na Neko no Machi Meltier

altTitles.ja: ふしぎな猫のまち メルティア

description.en:
This is "Meltier," a town of cats. Moko, who has no memory of her past, ends up helping out at a coffee shop in town. There, she meets many unique and fun kittens and friends! A little bit mysterious and extraordinarily happy. A heartwarming fairy tale fantasy of everyday life!

---
Note: Has an original song sung by the author herself called はじめまして、世界！

title.en: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon

altTitles.en: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon

altTitles.pt-br: O Soldado Esqueleto Que Não Conseguia Proteger a Dungeon

altTitles.ja: 骸骨兵士はダンジョンを守れなかった

altTitles.zh: 骷髅骑士没能守住副本

description.de: Die Abenteuer eines scheinbar schwachen Skelettsoldaten, dessen einziges Ziel es ist, seine Herrin, Lady Sukkubus, zu beschützen und ihr zu dienen. Sein Traum eines friedlichen Lebens mit ihr findet ein jähes Ende, als die beiden von einer Gruppe Krieger brutal ermordet wird. Aber aus einem kläglichen Ende wird ein hoffnungsvoller Neuanfang, als der Skelettsoldat sich 20 Jahre in der Vergangenheit wiederfindet! „Ich muss Lady Sukkubus vor all dem warnen!“ Aber ohne besondere Kampffähigkeiten und einer Geschichte voller Fehlschläge und Verluste, wie kann er diese grauenvolle Zukunft abwenden? Folge dem Skelettsoldaten in seiner bisher wichtigsten Mission: Seine eigene Geschichte neu zu schreiben.
description.en:
The Skeleton Soldier, a meager but fiercely loyal fighter who serves to protect its master, Lady Succubus. Its dream of a peaceful life with her is shattered when they're both brutally murdered by a group of warriors one day.

But what would’ve been a pathetic end to an unremarkable soul sparks a new beginning: when the Skeleton Soldier opens its eyes again, it has traveled back 20 years in time!

“I must warn Lady Succubus of all the things to come!”

But with no special combat skills and a history of failure and defeat, how can it stop the horrible events from unfolding again?

Follow the Skeleton Soldier as it faces the most challenging quest of all — rewriting the ending to its own story.
description.fr: Découvrez le Soldat Squelette, le frêle mais loyal combattant, se battant pour protéger sa maîtresse, Dame Succube. Son rêve d'une vie paisible à ses côtés est réduit à néant le jour où ils sont tous les deux brutalement assassinés par un groupe de guerriers. Mais ce qui allait être une fin tragique se révèle être en fait un nouveau commencement : le Soldat Squelette se réveille de nouveau... 20 ans plus tôt ! Il doit prévenir sa Dame du danger qui les guette, mais sans compétences au combat, et un large historique de défaites, sera-t-il capable de sauver leur avenir ? Suivez ce courageux squelette dans sa quête pour changer le cours du temps et son tragique destin !
description.ja: 「お守りできず、申し訳ありません…」　名もなきモンスター「骸骨兵士」は、主のサキュバスを守れぬまま、自分の弱さを嘆きつつ心半ばで朽ち果てる…が、いきなり20年前に蘇る！何度死んでも蘇り、蘇るたびに経験値も蓄積されていく謎のシステムまで付加された。「このチャンス、逃さないでおくべきか」いつか再会するであろうサキュバス様を守るため、骸骨兵士は強くなることを誓う
description.ko:
"지키기 위해서 나는 강해진다!"


이름 없는 일개 몬스터 '해골병사'.

자신의 주인인 서큐버스를 지키지 못한채 죽임을 당한다.

그러나,

갑자기 20년 전으로 돌아간다?!

일생일대의 최대의 기회!


자신이 지키기 못한 서큐버스를 위해서

해골은 성장해 나간다!
description.ru: Защитить хозяйку было его единственным предназначением, но он не смог исполнить его. Однако судьба дарует ему новый шанс. Шанс стать сильнее и спасти свою госпожу. Шанс переписать историю.
description.zh: 骷髅骑士发现自己回到了20年前，这一世骷髅骑士立志要好好守护主人。然而...都死了那么多次，怎么还没找到守护主人的正确打开方式！一次不行那就再来第二次，第二次不行那就来第三次…这是一个可以无限次重生的骷髅骑士的奇幻历险故事。
description.pt-br: Seu único propósito era proteger sua mestra. Mesmo assim ele foi incapaz. Mas o destino tinha mais reservado a ele já que conseguiu uma nova chance para proteger sua mestra e mudar seu destino.
description.zh-hk:
「為了守護珍愛的一切，我必須變強!」
無名怪物「骷髏士兵」沒能守護自己的主人魅魔，
便慘遭殺害。

然而，他卻突然回到了20年前?!
這是千載難逢的絕佳機會!

為了自己上次守護不了的魅魔，
骷髏將會努力成長!

description.en:
1199 - 10 years after the death of Minamoto no Yoshitsune at Hiraizumi. Japan is now under the shogun Minamoto no Yoriie, son of Yoritomo, who had schemed against Yoshitsune. Yoriie hears of followers of Yoshitsune still lurk about, and is more than willing to get rid of those thorns in his side. However, they are more pertinent than he could imagine...for Yoshitsune's orphaned son, Hoshiwakamaru, has survived, and is planning to avenge his father with fellow pirates and conspiring officials!

A tale of alternate history set at the dawn of the Kamakura period, with some fantastical elements mixed in.

altTitles.th: คุณครูจอมเวท เนกิมะ!

description.en: Ten-year-old prodigy Negi Springfield, has just graduated from magic academy, and in order to become a master mage he is sent to Japan to teach English at an all-girls middle school. But Negi has a bigger dream than just becoming a master mage. He wants to find his missing father, "The Thousand Master", the strongest mage that has ever lived. And he soon finds that searching for his father wont be as easy as he first hoped. In fact, it pushes him and his students into life-or-death battles that decides the fate of millions.

As a child, Thorfinn sat at the feet of the great Leif Ericson and thrilled to wild tales of a land far to the west. But his youthful fantasies were shattered by a mercenary raid. Raised by the Vikings who murdered his family, Thorfinn became a terrifying warrior, forever seeking to kill the band's leader, Askeladd, and avenge his father. Sustaining Thorfinn through his ordeal are his pride in his family and his dreams of a fertile westward land, a land without war or slavery… the land Leif called Vinland.  

---
- **Won the Japan Media Arts Award Division Grand Prize in 2009**
- **Won the 36th Kodansha Manga Award for General Manga in 2012**
description.ru: Эта история случилась в начале XI века, когда викинги, безраздельно господствовавшие в северных морях, грабили побережья Франции и Англии. В эпоху, где оружие значило больше, нежели слова, маленький мальчик невольно оказывается косвенной причиной гибели своего отца. Повзрослев и став на путь воина, он жаждет честного поединка с убийцей отца – легендарным главарём отряда викингов-наемников, но возраст и отсутствие опыта не позволяют ему сделать это. Чтобы не упускать своего врага из виду, юноша вступает в его отряд и в награду за выполнение тяжелого боевого задания требует поединка с ним, но терпит поражение. Юноша продолжает прилагать все усилия, чтобы осуществить свою месть. Внезапно он оказывается вовлечён в куда более кровавое столкновение…
description.tr: Çocukken Thorfinn, büyük Leif Ericson'un ayaklarının dibinde oturur ve batıdaki uzak diyarların vahşi masallarıyla heyecanlanırdı. Ama gençlik hayalleri bir paralı asker baskınıyla paramparça oldu. Ailesini öldüren Vikingler tarafından yetiştirilen Thorfinn, grubun lideri Askeladd'ı öldürmek ve babasının intikamını almak isteyen korkunç bir savaşçı oldu. Thorfinn'i çileli yaşamı boyunca ayakta tutan, ailesiyle olan gururu ve batıdaki bereketli topraklara, savaşın ve köleliğin olmadığı bir ülkeye, Leif'in Vinland adını verdiği topraklara dair hayalleridir.
description.pt-br: Thorfinn é filho de Thors, um lendário guerreiro viking, mas que após anos no campo de batalha, descobre uma coisa mais maravilhosa que matar seus iguais. Viver sua própria vida, em paz. Mas os ventos lhe trazem uma notícia que atrapalhará seus dias de paz, e Thorfinn, seu filho, pouco sabe desta vida passada de guerra de seu pai. Após descobrir o passado de seu pai, Thorfinn se revolta contra ele, e sai para a guerra junto de seu pai, mas quando reconhece o verdadeiro valor dele, já é tarde demais. Agora Thorfinn deverá seguir sua própria vida, seguindo valores que seu pai lhe ensinou, mas sem perder sua coragem. Este é só o começo desta grande saga de Thorfinn que acompanha os Vikings no século XI!

altTitles.th: หาญสู้พลิกชะตาอาถรรพณ์

description.en:
The story is set in a "land where two worlds intersect," and it centers on "a strange romance between a boy and girl who meet by fate."

(from ebookjapan):

Onmyoji and Yokai? A girl's bizarre Taisho romance! When she was in the first grade of elementary school, her whole family was involved in an accident, but she is the only one who survived. In her third year of junior high school, she passes by the accident site again and is somehow transported back to the Taisho Era!　

The next day, Nanoka's physical abilities are awakened when she is told by Mao, a boy she met there who is an Onmyoji, "You are a demon, aren't you?" The Taisho bizarre romance in which the two of them face their "destiny" that will come begins!


---
Official Release:
- English release by [Viz Media](https://www.viz.com/mao)
- Indonesian release by [Elex Media](https://www.gramedia.com/products/mao-01) (2021)

Takase is the opposite of his brother. He's weaker and struggles in school. He recently moved into his married brother's house in order to receive coaching to improve his physical health. The coach, also known as the "Venus of Track," is none other than his sister-in-law. The Venus of Track is researching and developing a new technique to improve male performance by testosterone management. In other words, manipulation of sexual desire. She has dubbed it "Absolute Obedience" and Takase must undergo it to improve himself. Takase's life is in for a dramatic change…
description.ja: 陸上部でパッとしない成績の高校生・浩太は、かつて“トラックのビーナス”と呼ばれていた義姉の恭子にコーチを依頼することに。ところが彼女が提案してきたのは、思いもよらないトレーニング方法だった……！！　性欲をガマンすることで一流の陸上選手を目指す、史上初・禁欲トレーニング＝略して禁トレコメディ！！
description.es-la: Takase es todo lo contrario a su hermano. Es más débil y tiene dificultades en la escuela. Recientemente se ha mudado a la casa de su hermano casado para recibir entrenamiento para mejorar su salud física. La entrenadora, también conocida como la "Venus del Atletismo", no es otra que su cuñada. La Venus del Atletismo está investigando y desarrollando una nueva técnica para mejorar el rendimiento masculino mediante la gestión de la testosterona. En otras palabras, la manipulación del deseo sexual. Ella la ha bautizado como "Obediencia Absoluta" y Takase debe someterse a ella para mejorar. La vida de Takase está abocada a un cambio drástico...
description.pt-br: Takase é o oposto de seu irmão. Ele é mais fraco e briga na escola. Ele recentemente se mudou para a casa de seu irmão casado para receber treinamento para melhorar sua saúde física. A treinadora, também conhecido como a "Vênus da Pista", não é outra senão sua cunhada. A Vênus da Pista está pesquisando e desenvolvendo uma nova técnica para melhorar o desempenho masculino através do controle de testosterona. Em outras palavras, manipulação do desejo sexual. Ela o apelidou de "Obediência Absoluta" e Takase deve passar por isso para melhorar a si mesmo. A vida de Takase está prestes a sofrer uma mudança dramática...

altTitles.ja-ro: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito ~Danzai sareta Tenseisha no Tame Usotsuki Heroine ni Fukushuu Itashimasu~

altTitles.ja: 悪役令嬢の中の人〜断罪された転生者のため嘘つきヒロインに復讐いたします〜

altTitles.zh: 恶役千金的真面目～为被定罪的转生者向骗子女主报复～

altTitles.zh-hk: 惡役千金的真面目～為被定罪的轉生者向騙子女主報復～

altTitles.ja: Akuyaku Reijou no Naka no Hito

altTitles.vi: Kẻ Cư Ngụ Bên Trong Ác Nữ

altTitles.fr: La fille au sein de l'antagoniste
Celle à l'intérieur de la vilaine

description.en:
In order to clear the name of 'Emi,' a girl who had reincarnated as Remilia, the villainess of an otome game, the real Remilia who had been watching all along inside awakens.

Now it's time for the true villainess' revenge to begin!
description.id:
Agar bisa membersihkan nama "Emi", yaitu nama seorang gadis yang bereinkarnasi menjadi Remilia sang villainess dari sebuah game otome, Remilia asli yang selama ini mengawasi emi dari dalam akhirnya telah tersadar.

Sekarang adalah waktunya bagi sang villainess yang asli untuk membalaskan dendamnya!

altTitles.ja: ローゼンガーテン・サーガ

description.en: Lynn's village getting attacked by bandits doesn't keep her down in the dumps for long! Picking up a sword housing an extraordinary pervert… I mean hero, Siegfried, she sets off on a journey of many bouts with various degenerat… ahem, heroes!

altTitles.es-la: Harén del Fin del Mundo - Fantasía

altTitles.ja: 終末のハーレム ファンタジア

description.en: It's year 998, and the world has been corrupted by darkness. The next head of the small border kingdom of Nagara, Ark, has feelings for his cousin, Aurelia, but a political marriage to the Crown Prince has separated them. In order to get her back, Ark desires immense power, but a mysterious dark elf, Rati, appears in front of him.  In exchange for a promise, she will give him "the power to rule the world." An erotic and dark fantasy begins!
description.ja: 聖暦998年。そこはまもなく終末を迎える闇に蝕まれた世界。辺境の小国ナーガラの次期当主・アルクは従姉のアウレリアと両想いだったが、皇太子との政略結婚のため引き離されてしまった。彼女を取り戻そうと強力な力を欲するアルクの前に現れた謎のダークエルフ・ラティ。ラティからある約束と引き換えに“この世を統べることができる力”を授けると告げられたアルクは――。エロティック＆ダークファンタジー開幕!!
description.es-la: Es el año 998, y el mundo ha sido corrompido por la oscuridad. El próximo jefe del pequeño reino fronterizo de Nagara, Alk, siente algo por su prima Aurelia, pero un matrimonio político con el príncipe heredero los ha separado. Para recuperarla, Alk anhela un inmenso poder, pero la misteriosa elfa oscura Rati aparece ante él.  A cambio de una promesa, ella le dará "el poder de gobernar el mundo". ¡Comienza una fantasía erótica y oscura!

altTitles.es-la: El harén del fin del mundo

description.en: The Man-Killer Virus: a lethal disease that has eradicated 99.9% of the world's male population. Mizuhara Reito has been in cryogenic sleep for the past five years, leaving behind Tachibana Erisa, the girl of his dreams. When Reito awakens from the deep freeze, he emerges into a sex-crazed new world where he himself is the planet's most precious resource. Reito and four other male studs are given lives of luxury and one simple mission: repopulate the world by impregnating as many women as possible! All Reito wants, however, is to find his beloved Erisa who went missing three years ago. Can Reito resist temptation and find his one true love?
description.ja: 時は2040年。難病に侵された青年・怜人は幼馴染の絵理沙と再会を誓い、病を治すためコールドスリープする。そして5年後――。目覚めた怜人を待っていたのは99.9%の男が死滅し50億人の女性が生きる世界だった…！　近未来エロティックサスペンス開幕！
description.es-la: El virus mata a los hombres: una enfermedad letal que ha erradicado el 99,9% de la población masculina del mundo. Mizuhara Reito ha estado en sueño criogénico durante los últimos cinco años, dejando atrás a Tachibana Erisa, la chica de sus sueños. Cuando Reito despierta del congelamiento, emerge en un nuevo mundo loco por el sexo donde él mismo es el recurso más preciado del planeta. Reito y otros cuatro sementales masculinos reciben vidas de lujo y una simple misión: ¡repoblar el mundo impregnando a tantas mujeres como sea posible! Sin embargo, todo lo que Reito quiere es encontrar a su amada Erisa, que desapareció hace tres años. ¿Puede Reito resistir la tentación y encontrar a su único y verdadero amor?

title.en: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi

altTitles.es: Cocina De Fogata En Otro Mundo Con Mi Habilidad Absurda

altTitles.en: Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill

altTitles.ja: とんでもスキルで異世界放浪メシ

altTitles.th: สกิลสุดพิสดารกับมื้ออาหารในต่างโลก

altTitles.ja-ro: Tondemo Sukiru de Isekai Hōrō Meshi

altTitles.zh-hk: 擁有超常技能的異世界流浪美食家

altTitles.zh: 网购技能开启异世界美食之旅

altTitles.en: Regarding the Display of an Outrageous Skill Which Has Incredible Powers

altTitles.ja-ro: Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi

description.en:
Mukouda Tsuyoshi has been summoned from modern Japan to a different world of sword and magic. He eagerly thought of what kind of a huge adventure was waiting for him, but actually, Mukouda is just a civilian who got caught in a Hero Summoning. On top of that, Mukouda’s base status is shabby compared to the legitimate heroes.
Suspecting the king of foul play, as he's morbidly obese in a kingdom in crisis, apart from being war-happy, Mukouda decides to leave the castle by presenting his lack of martial prowess. The only thing that Mukouda can rely on in this world is his unique skill Net Supermarket, that can only order goods from modern Japan’s internet to the new world.
description.es: Mukouda Tuyoshi ha sido invocado desde el Japón contemporáneo a un mundo fantástico de espadas y magia. Con ansia se emocionó con la gran aventura que le esperaba, pero Mukouda es solo un civil que fue traído por accidente durante la Invocación del Héroe. Aparte de todo, el nivel básico de Mukouda es mediocre comparado con el de los verdaderos héroes. Sospechando de malas intenciones por parte del rey, el cual es mórbidamente obeso en un reino en crisis aparte de ser aficionado a la guerra, Mukouda decide dejar el castillo argumentando su falta de capacidad de combate. El único factor con el cual Mukouda cuenta en este mundo es su habilidad "Supermercado de Red" que solamente puede ordenar bienes del internet del Japón moderno al nuevo mundo.

description.en: Kael and Baby are neighbors who have been friends since childhood. Kael is a shy and reserved boy, while Baby is an outgoing and passionate girl. When Baby meets Kai, Kael's older brother, she is instantly attracted to him. Kael is also interested in Beryl, Baby's older sister. The two decide to collaborate to help each other set up a relationship with their siblings, but Kael keeps a secret...

altTitles.th: เจ้าสาวผมแดงกับจอมเวทอสูร

description.en:
With her mother dead and father long gone, Chise Hatori has spent her childhood being passed unwanted from relative to relative, 
until she finally makes her unfortunate way to a strange and improbable auction block.

Offered as a “Slay Vega” to the highest bidder, Chise is purchased by the (literally) boneheaded Elias Ainsworth, 
who promises to take her on as his apprentice.

Elias is a mage, and his world is one of dragons and faeries - but before Chise can begin to get accustomed to all of this, 
Elias drops another bombshell. Apparently Chise isn't just intended to be his apprentice - she will also be his bride.
description.es: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.ja: 少女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使い――……。羽鳥チセ15歳。身寄りもなく、生きる希望も術も持たぬ彼女を金で買ったのは、ヒト為らざる魔法使いだった……。
description.es-la: Chise Hatori tiene 15 años. Sin parientes, sin esperanzas en la vida y sin habilidades, fue comprada con dinero por un mago no humano...
description.pt-br:
Hatori Chise tem apenas 16 anos, mas ela já perdeu muito mais do que o esperado. Sem uma família nem esperança, parece que todas as portas estão fechadas para ela. Mas um encontro acidental começou a mover as rodas enferrujadas do destino. 

Na sua hora mais escura, um misterioso mago aparece diante de Chise, oferecendo uma chance que ela não poderia recusar. 

Esse mago, que parece mais um demônio do que um humano, irá ele trazer a ela a luz que desesperadamente busca, ou afogá-la em sombras ainda mais profundas?

altTitles.th: แวมเพียร์ซ แวมไพร์สุดที่รัก

description.en:
On the day of her grandmother's funeral, Ichika meets Aria, a beautiful foreigner who claims to be her grandmother's friend.
But Ichika soon finds that Aria is no normal human ; she is a vampire, and their relationship has just begun...
description.es: Uma pequena história de amor sobre uma garota e uma vampira.
description.pt-br: As coisas mudam na vida de Ichika no dia em que sua avó morre. No funeral aparecem muitos parentes e conhecidos que só a incomodam com as típicas perguntas sobre se ter ou não um namorado, além de comparações com a avó. Uma garota se destaca entre todos: Aria. Ela parece saber muitas coisas sobre sua família e também vem se despedir dela, conseguindo atrair poderosamente a atenção de Ichika, que imediatamente fica absorvida por ela. O que Ichika não sabe é que Aria é uma vampira e não demorará muito para que ela lhe prove isso...

altTitles.ko: 그 고양이 말고 이 고양이 그냥이냥

description.en:
Nam Yooho loves cats so much that he enrolled in veterinary school. He is now in his third year, and has been having trouble lately. While taking care of Man-deuk, a stray cat, he meets a junior named Ryu Si-an, who appears in his dreams as a cat hybrid and dreams of having sex with him. After being struck by a kinky dream that violates his professional ethics, Yooho tries to avoid Si-an as much as possible...

What the hell are you, and why do you show up as a cat in real life?!

Geniuses who made a name for themselves in middle school baseball but have been away from baseball accidentally come together at an obscure metropolitan high school. Haruka Kiyomine is a pitcher with an unbeatable arm. His partner, the shrewd catcher, Kei Kaname, is now an amateur due to amnesia!. And then there are the two of them. And those who were defeated and scattered by the two in the past… The story of their high school baseball game is about to begin again!

To stop the otherworldly "Kaijuu" aliens from invading Earth, 
individuals wielding special powers known as "Aegis" are tasked with the protection of the world. 
Aratsugu Yorino is one of the aspiring "Bastioners" - soldiers who fight the invaders within the wall between the two worlds.  
  
Yorino and her best friend Haruka were always at the top of their class, and vowed to become professional Bastioners together. 
However, when a Kaijuu broke through the wall during one of their exercises, Haruka lost her life saving Yorino. 
Cornered by the Kaijuu once again, Yorino was rescued by a Bastioner called Kaminoi Youko. 
After asking Yorino to give her Aegis energy, Youko defeated the Kaijuu with overwhelming power.   
  
With her heart full of determination, Yorino placed first on the Bastioner exam, all for the sake of saving herself from ever feeling loss again.

title.en: I'm in Love with the Villainess

altTitles.zh: 我的首推是恶役大小姐

altTitles.zh-hk: 我的首推是惡役大小姐

altTitles.zh-ro: Wǒ de shǒutuī shì è yì dà xiǎojiě

altTitles.th: ทำไงดีเกมนี้นางร้ายน่ารัก

altTitles.ja-ro: Watashi no Oshi wa Akuyaku Reijou.

altTitles.es-la: Mi Oshi Es Una Villa Noble

description.de:
Oohashi Rei - eigentlich eine ganz normale Büroangestellte - wacht eines Tages im Körper der Protagonistin ihres absoluten Lieblingsspiels "Revolution" auf. Eigentlich geht es in dem Spiel darum, mit einem von drei absolut wundervollen Prinzen zusammenzukommen. Ein klassisches Otome-Game, und wenn es nach Rei geht, auch das mit Abstand beste.  
Ihr Hauptinteresse lag dabei jedoch nicht etwa an einem der männlichen Charaktere, sondern an Claire François, der Antagonistin des Spiels.

Wird Rei es schaffen, eine romantische Beziehung zu ihr aufzubauen? Wie werden die eigentlichen Stars des Spiels, die drei Prinzen, auf diese Situation reagieren?  
Und was hält Claire überhaupt davon?
description.en:
Ordinary office worker Oohashi Rei wakes up in the body of the protagonist of her favourite otome game, *Revolution*. To her delight, the first person to greet her is also her favourite character, Claire François – the main antagonist of the story!

Now, Rei is determined to romance Claire instead of the game’s male leads. But how will her villainous lady love react to this new courtship?!
description.fr:
Rei Ôhashi, une simple employée de bureau d’une petite entreprise, se retrouve soudainement dans le corps de l’héroïne de son jeu vidéo de drague préféré, Revolution.
Maintenant sous le nom de Rae Taylor, elle est prête à accomplir son objectif.
Passer du bon temps avec les princes du jeu ? Non.
Son cœur appartient à la méchante de l’histoire, Claire François.
Bien décidée à la chérir et à rester à ses côtés, sa nouvelle vie commence dans un monde empreint de magie !
description.id: Seorang pegawai kantor biasa, Oohashi Rei, bereinkarnasi sebagai seorang Heroine bernama Rei Taylor di Game Otome favoritnya, "Revolution". Kebetulan lagi, orang pertama yang menyambutnya adalah karakter favoritnya, Claire Francois- antagonis dari cerita ini! Kini Rei bertekad untuk membangun hubungan romantis dengan Claire, bukan dengan pemeran utama pria. Lantas, bagaimanakah gadis jahat yang dia cintai akan bereaksi terhadap kemesraan baru ini?!
description.it:
La normale impiegata Oohashi Rei si sveglia nel corpo della protagonista del suo gioco otome preferito, Revolution. Per la sua gioia, la prima persona che incontra è anche il suo personaggio preferito, Claire François, l'antagonista principale della storia! Ora Rei è determinata a perseguire una storia d'amore con Claire piuttosto che con gli interessi amorosi maschili. Ma come reagirà la sua amata antagonista a questo nuovo corteggiamento?!
L'anime debutterà ad ottobre 2023!
Annunciato il manga ufficiale italiano!
description.ja: 乙女ゲーム『Revolution』の世界に、ヒロインのレイ＝テイラーとして転生した社畜OL・大橋零。そんな彼女の推しは攻略対象の王子たち…ではなく、悪役令嬢・クレア＝フランソワだった!　前世でゲームをやりこんでいたレイは、その知識と愛で、クレアとお近づきになることができるのか？
description.es-la: Oohashi Rei, una trabajadora de oficina ordinaria se despierta en el cuerpo de la protagonista de su juego otome favorito, "Revolution". Para su deleite, la primera persona en saludarla es también su personaje favorito, Claire Francois, ¡la principal antagonista de la historia! Ahora, Rei está decidida a enamorarse de Claire en lugar de los protagonistas masculinos del juego. ¿Pero cómo reaccionará la villana ante este nuevo cortejo?

description.en: An unpredictable suspense story about a girl and boy who have a twisted love

title.en: Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume: to, Pochi no Daibouken

altTitles.ja: 悠久の愚者アズリーの、賢者のすゝめ
Yuukyuu no Gusha Asley no, Kenja no Susume

altTitles.en: The Eternal Fool's Words of Wisdom: A Pawsitively Fantastic Adventure

altTitles.pt-br: O Princípio de um Filósofo por um eterno idiota "Asley".

altTitles.en: The Principle of a Philosopher by Eternal Fool "Asley"

description.en:
A couple thousand years of solitude would wear down any young man — that is, anyone except Asley, an eternally youthful and eternally foolish sorcerer. After all, he has man’s best friend... er, familiar, to keep him company.

When his Level 100 canine companion Pochi demands that he get some fresh air for the first time in two centuries, Asley sets out to reintegrate into society and test his magic mettle. His mission? Dropping several unglamorous titles from his repertoire and restoring his good (okay, decent) name.

A brand-new world and fresh adventures await Asley after his many years of hermitage. Perhaps he’ll lend Pochi a hand to place first in the mysterious Familiar Feud. Or maybe he’ll lose all vestiges of dignity and turn tail. Whichever comes first!

No matter what, Asley has great evil to fight, a big world to save, and even a little growing up to do... that is, if he can endure Pochi’s “friendly advice” along the way!
description.ru:
В молодости Азли потерпел неудачу в Волшебной Академии, после чего был высмеян людьми. Тогда бросив академию Азли решил занятся алхимией и случайно сделал эликсир бессмертия. Погрузившись в исследования Азли не заметил как прошло много времени.  
После 5000 лет исследований он стал волшебником, но кое-что он упустил. Люди, которым он хотел отомстить, давно умерли. Потеряв свою цель, Азли решил отправиться в путешествие со своим другом Почи, чтобы посмотреть, как изменился мир спустя 5000 лет. Что же его ждёт впереди?!
description.pt-br: Quando ele era jovem, ele falhou na Academia de Magia e foi menosprezado por outros. No entanto, por acaso, ele descobriu um remédio mitológico, então ele obteve um corpo imortal. Para se vingar das pessoas que zombavam dele, ele começou a pesquisar magia e artefatos mágicos diferentes da academia. Após 5000 anos de pesquisa, ele se tornou um antigo usuário de magia antes de perceber. As pessoas que ele estava procurando vingança se foram a muito tempo; Perdendo seu propósito, Asley foi em uma viagem para ver o mundo depois de 5000 anos com sua familiar Pochi. Com uma virada inesperada de eventos depois de ajudar muitos humanos, ele agora está vivendo na academia de magia. Um homem de 5000 anos com uma jovem aparência Asley, como ele vai viver a juventude da sua segunda vida? - Baseado em um romance/novela

title.en: Isekai Ten'i Shite Kyoushi ni Natta ga, Majo to Osorerareteiru Ken ~Aoi-sensei no Gakuen Funtou Nisshi~

altTitles.ja: 異世界転移して教師になったが、魔女と恐れられている件　～アオイ先生の学園奮闘日誌～

altTitles.en: I Was Transferred To Another World And Became A Teacher, But I'm Feared As A Witch: Aoi-sensei's Academy Struggle Log

altTitles.es-la: Fui llevada a otro mundo, me convertí en maestra, pero ahora todos me temen como a una bruja

description.en:
Aoi is a new teacher who has been transported to another world.

Aoi is picked up by Owen, an elf, and as they live together, Aoi masters more and more of Owen's magic and even surpasses him. In order to refine her magic further, she is assigned to teach at the Fiddich Academy, a school of magic!

Aoi starts her teaching career showcasing overwhelming magical abilities, and she is not daunted by the aristocratic troublemakers who dominate the academy.
However, her abilities have become the talk of the school...

Aoi's life as a new teacher at the academy begins with a tumultuous start...!
description.ja: 異世界に転移してしまった、新人教師のアオイ。エルフのオーウェンに拾われ一緒に暮らすなかで、アオイはオーウェンの持つ魔法をどんどんマスター。より魔法を極めるため、魔術学校であるフィディック学院に教師として赴任することに！学院内にのさばる貴族の問題児たちにも屈せず、圧倒的な魔法能力で教師生活をスタートさせたアオイ。しかし、その能力ゆえに学院内で話題になってしまい・・・。
description.es-la: Aoi es una nueva maestra que ha sido transportada a otro mundo. Mientras es recogido por el elfo Owen y vive con él, Aoi gradualmente domina la magia de Owen. Para seguir dominando la magia, decidí aceptar un trabajo como profesora en Fiddik Academy, ¡una escuela de magia! Aoi no cede ante los problemas de los hijos de los aristócratas de la escuela y comienza su vida como maestra con una habilidad mágica abrumadora. Sin embargo, debido a su habilidad, se convirtió en un tema candente dentro de la escuela... ¡Un comienzo turbulento en la vida escolar de la nueva maestra Aoi!

description.en:
Taira Capeta was a 4th grader boy. He had lost his mother when he had been very little. Although he pretended to be tough in front of his father, actually he felt lonely. One day, his father brought junk parts home from his workplace and made a racing kart. Soon, they went to a circuit to drive the kart. However, Capeta found that its frame was bent and it could hardly run straight. But, with his technique he managed the kart. Furthermore, he followed soon after the fast kart and he could nearly leave it behind. The driver in the kart was Minamoto Naomi, the champion of the East Japan Junior Kart. Looking at their chase, Naomi’s mother, Minamoto Nanako, advised Capeta to take part in the official race.  
  
This manga won the Kodansha Manga Award for shōnen in 2005.
description.pt-br:
Taira Capeta também conhecido como “Capeta”, é um menino de 10 anos, cujo pai, viúvo, de nome Shige Taira, trabalha em obras de pavimentação de uma empresa. Após concluir um trabalho de pavimentação em uma pista de kart, o pai vê um menino correndo na pista e fica pasmo com a velocidade e a emoção aparente do esporte. 
Percebendo que seu filho tem interesse em carros de corrida (especialmente pela Fórmula 1), Shigeo pergunta ao dono do circuito se ele pode usar algumas peças antigas que estavam empilhadas no lixo do circuito. Levando as peças para a empresa onde trabalha, ele consegue construir um kart. O chefe de Shige, o Sr. Ikari, inicialmente a contragosto, fornece um motor de gerador de 4 tempos para o kart. 
Determinado, Capeta, em sua primeira vez em uma pista de corrida, consegue não só dominar os problemas de seu kart, mas também começa as tentativas para ultrapassar pela linha de dentro o jovem piloto Naomi Minamoto. Naomi é um piloto jovem e talentoso que dirige para a equipe Auto House Liarize Racingnota 1. Esta tentativa de ultrapassagem espanta Naomi tanto que ele pisa fundo no acelerador de seu kart, mantendo-se na dianteira de Capeta. Isso enfurece sua mãe, também chefe da equipe, Nanako Minamoto, pois se tratava apenas de um aquecimento para um motor totalmente novo. Capeta conta com a ajuda de Nobu Andou, seu assistente técnico e de Monami Suzuki o gerente da equipe.

description.en: The Extraordinary Museum is a vast castle suspended in an upside-down subspace. After my sister vanished, I found myself as the sole employee of this place. How can I even begin to describe this feeling? Watching over the world's greatest collection of treasures, I must admit, is a bit overwhelming.

During the Warring States period, the demon king Gosun, who has been hiding in the Himalayas for a hundred years and has mastered evil sorcery, is aiming to conquer Japan. Shishimaru fights as the invincible ninja Kaikitsu Lionmaru with the sword given to him by Koji Kashin, Japan's greatest ninja!

altTitles.th: มายฮีโร่ อคาเดเมีย

altTitles.ja: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

description.en:
One day, a four-year-old boy came to a sudden realization: the world is not fair. Eighty percent of the world's population wield special abilities, known as "quirks," which have given many the power to make their childhood dreams of becoming a superhero a reality. Unfortunately, Izuku Midoriya was one of the few born without a quirk, suffering from discrimination because of it. Yet, he refuses to give up on his dream of becoming a hero; determined to do the impossible, Izuku sets his sights on the elite hero training academy, UA High.  
  
However, everything changes after a chance meeting with the number one hero and Izuku's idol, All Might. Discovering that his dream is not a dead end, the powerless boy undergoes special training, working harder than ever before. Eventually, this leads to him inheriting All Might's power, and with his newfound abilities, gets into his school of choice, beginning his grueling journey to become the successor of the best hero on the planet.

---

**Note: Because a takedown notice was sent to MangaDex from the owners of this series, fan translations of My Hero Academia are currently unavailable to be uploaded. The series can be read in its entirety at [the official Shonen Jump website,](https://www.viz.com/shonenjump/chapters/my-hero-academia) with the first and latest three chapters available at any time and the rest accessible with a Shonen Jump membership (which costs about $2 a month and can be accessed via a VPN if you are outside the US). The three most recent chapters can also be read on MangaPlus for free at the below link.**
description.ru: Манга повествует о мире, где больший процент населения человечества рождается с необычной способностью (называется это - причуда), но наш главный герой в этот процент не попал. И по всем законам жанра неудачник сам упорно пытается достичь небывалой силы и приблизиться к своей мечте - стать супергероем.
description.vi:
Thế giới trở nên tràn ngập những người sở hữu một thứ siêu năng lực gọi là "Kosei"! Các "Siêu anh hùng" xuất hiện chống lại những tên tội phạm "Villain" chuyên lợi dụng "Kosei" để lộng hành. Sức mạnh áp đảo của họ làm nhiều người vô cùng ngưỡng mộ. Nhân vật chính là cậu bé Midoriya Izuku (tên thường gọi là "Deku") cũng ôm ấp giấc mơ trở thành "Siêu anh hùng"....!?

(Source: MangaPlus)
description.pt-br: Em um mundo onde quase toda a população possui algum poder sobre-humano, Izuku Midoriya é um dos poucos casos de pessoas comuns. Mas esse não é o maior de seus problemas. Exatamente por ser desprovido de qualquer poder, Izuku sofre constantemente nas mãos de seus colegas de classe. Nesse mundo fictício, desde o primeiro caso constatado de um recém-nascido com algum tipo de poder, o índice de criminalidade cresceu proporcional ao surgimento de heróis com as mais variadas capacidades. E, como não poderia deixar de ser, o sonho de Izuku é se tornar um super-herói. Isso parecia impossível, até o dia que ele ajuda o poderoso All Might na captura de um vilão gosmento. Ao demonstrar grande coragem e um forte senso de justiça, com a ajuda do famoso herói de cabelos louros, o garoto enfim terá a chance de se tornar quem sempre sonhou!

title.en: The Kouhai who Went from Introvert to Influencer

description.de:
Im Alter von acht Jahren verlor Ijin Yoo seine Eltern bei einem Flugzeugabsturz und strandete in einem fremden Land, wo er gezwungen war, ein Kindersöldner zu werden, um zu überleben. Zehn Jahre später kehrt er nach Hause zurück, um mit seiner Familie in Korea wieder vereint zu sein. Dort scheint alles friedlich zu sein, doch schon bald muss Ijin feststellen, dass das Leben als Teenager eine ganz andere Art des Überlebens ist. Da ihm nur noch ein Jahr in der Oberschule bleibt, muss Ijin neue Taktiken erlernen, um sich auf dem Schlachtfeld der Schule zurechtzufinden. Kann er ein Jahr Oberschule überleben? Oder wird die Schule vielmehr in der Lage sein, IHN zu überleben?

---
Die Geschichte handelt von einem jungen Koreaner, der bei einem Flugzeugabsturz seine Eltern verloren hat. Das Kind landet irgendwie in einem vom Krieg zerrissenen Teil der Welt und wird zu einem Top-Söldner im Teenageralter. Irgendwie findet er seine Familie wieder und beschließen, ein ruhiges Leben mit seiner Familie zu führen.

---

description.en:
At the age of eight, Ijin Yu lost his parents in a plane crash and became stranded in a foreign land, forced to become a child mercenary in order to stay alive. He returns home ten years later to be reunited with his family in Korea, where food and shelter are plenty and everything seems peaceful. But Ijin will soon learn that life as a teenager is a whole other feat of survival. With only one year of high school left, Ijin must master new tactics to maneuver his way around the schoolhouse battleground.

Can he survive a year of high school? Or rather, will the school be able to survive him?
description.es:
A los ocho años, Ijin Yu perdió a sus padres en un accidente aéreo y quedó varado en un país extranjero, forzado a convertirse en mercenario para sobrevivir. Diez años después, regresa a su hogar para reunirse con su familia en Corea, en donde sobra la comida y todo parece estar en paz. Sin embargo, Ijin pronto descubrirá que la vida de adolescente es otro tipo de supervivencia. En su último año de secundaria, Ijin debe dominar nuevas tácticas para resistir en el campo de batalla escolar. ¿Podrá sobrevivir a su último año? ¿O podrá su escuela sobrevivir a él?

---

description.en: Shen Chu, burdened with an incomplete soul, heads to Zhuo Lu, the cultivation world's most prestigious academy, with a very specific goal in mind. Upon his arrival, his world, previously dimmed by his incomplete soul, unexpectedly brightens due to a young man with striking blue hair. Could this be the person Shen Chu has been searching for? As he navigates the relaxing day-to-day life of academy studies, Shen Chu soon finds a complex web of intertwined timelines and ancient conspiracies unraveling around him, revealing secrets that could change everything.

Yajima has been able to see spirits since he was small. At his new school is a room that nobody else can see. And inside is a spirit who loves playing video games. A new modern exorcist saga now begins!
description.fr: Yajima est capable de voir les esprits depuis qu'il est tout petit. Dans sa nouvelle école, il y a une pièce que personne d'autre ne peut voir. Et à l'intérieur se trouve un esprit qui aime jouer aux jeux vidéo. Une nouvelle saga d'exorcistes modernes commence !
description.vi: Yajima đã có thể nhìn thấy các linh hồn từ khi còn nhỏ. Tại ngôi trường mới của cậu ấy có một căn phòng mà không ai khác có thể nhìn thấy. Và bên trong là một linh hồn thích chơi trò chơi điện tử. Một câu chuyện trừ tà hiện đại bắt đầu từ giây phút này!

title.en: Outaishi-sama, Watashi Kondo Koso Anata ni Korosaretakunain desu!

altTitles.ja: 王太子様、私今度こそあなたに殺されたくないんです〜聖女に嵌められた貧乏令嬢、二度目は串刺し回避します！〜

altTitles.en: You Won't Kill Me This Time, Crown Prince!

altTitles.zh-hk: 王太子大人，这次我绝不想被你杀掉！

description.en: The poverty-stricken noblewoman, Liesel, was murdered by her lover, the crown prince, in an elaborate ruse set up by the evil saintess. However, she receives a second chance to live as she suddenly wakes up as her childhood self. She takes this event as a chance to change her life, and live without ties to both the crown prince and the saintess, but by a strange twist of fate, she becomes entangled with the saintess's childhood friend! A woman with a strong will to live who has been ensnared by fateーLiesel's success story begins here!

altTitles.vi: Thánh Nữ Cecilia và Mục Sư Lawrence

description.en: With the cute and able-bodied saint, along with the overprotective yet dense pastor, the "natural love comedy" unfolds!!
description.vi: Thánh nữ Cecilia có một bí mật - đó là cô sống hoàn toàn phụ thuộc vào Lawrence, mục sư của nhà thờ. Ngoài ra cô còn có một tình cảm bí mật đối với Lawrence, nói bí mật cho oai thế thôi chứ ai cũng biết riêng chỉ có Lawrence là không biết thôi

description.en:
Chigusa Tsukikage holds the rights to the play "The Crimson Goddess," a lost masterpiece that many would love to see brought back to the stage.  
  
Tsukikage, however, won't allow the cherished work to be diminished by an actress who isn't worthy of playing the title role. Fortunately, she has found two young actresses that just might be worthy: Maya Kitajima and Ayumi Himekawa. Though both actresses are exceptionally talented, only one can win the coveted role.

---
- **Won the Japan Cartoonists Association Award in 1995**

---

description.en:
The dark soldier Dariel (30 years old) who can't use magic while in the Demon Lord's army, was fired for his lack of capacity. Having been raised by the previous Demon Lord himself, he finds that his adoptive brother, the new Demon Lord has little use for him. However, once he rescues a villager girl from a forest monster, Dariel is invited into her village and starts realizing that he may be considerably more powerful than what he thought…

---

- [Anime airing on Crunchyroll](https://www.crunchyroll.com/series/G79H23XWZ/chillin-in-my-30s-after-getting-fired-from-the-demon-kings-army)
description.es: El soldado oscuro Dariel (de 30 años) que no puede usar magia mientras está en el ejército del Señor de los Demonios, fue despedido por su falta de capacidad. Habiendo sido criado por el anterior Señor de los Demonios, se encuentra con el hecho de que su hermano adoptivo, el nuevo Señor de los Demonios, tiene poco uso para él. Sin embargo, una vez rescata a una muchacha de aldea de un monstruo del bosque, Dariel es invitado a la aldea y se empieza a dar cuenta de que es considerablemente más poderoso de lo que pensaba…
description.ja: 魔王軍の暗黒兵士でありながら魔法が使えないダリエル（30代）に告げられた‥‥突然の解雇宣告！！　故郷を追い出されたダリエルは人間族の村に流れ着き、魔族では授かれない冒険スキルを開花させる！　「俺は‥‥人間だった‥‥？」駆け出し冒険者に舞い込む採取に討伐に、村娘からの猛烈アタック！？
description.ru: Тёмный солдат Дариэль (30 лет), который не мог использовать магию будучи в армии Короля Демонов, был уволен из-за никчемности своих способностей. От безнадёжности начинает новую жизнь в человеческой деревне, в которую его занесло… занесли!

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya de Wotaku de Binbou Dakedo Bijin Ojou-sama ni Osaretemasu

altTitles.pt-br: Eu sou um otaku tímido e pobre, mas essa jovem linda e rica está obcecada por mim

altTitles.ru: Я застенчивый и бедный отаку, но эта красивая богатая юная леди одержима мной.

altTitles.en: I'm a Shy and Poor Otaku, but This Beautiful Rich Young Lady Is Obsessed With Me

description.en: Eiji is a high school student who lives with his father, an unsuccessful novelist. He is a shy, otaku, and poor boy, but he is an honest boy who never forgets the compassion for others that his late mother taught him. Even he yearns for Aoi, the daughter of the president of a large company. However, Eiji is unable to look Aoi in the eye because of the huge disparity between her and himself. One day after school, Aoi greets Eiji when he comes home. Aoi says one surprising thing to the surprised Eiji...
description.ja:
YouTube動画で550万再生！　運命に導かれたベタ甘ラブコメ！
エイジは陰キャでヲタクで貧乏だけど他人に対する思いやりの気持ちを忘れない素直な少年。そんなエイジも憧れる社長令嬢アオイさんがある日、エイジの自宅を訪れ、突如としてエイジとの婚約を告げるが…。

Yūchūbu dōga de 550 man saisei! Unmei ni michibika reta beta ama rabu kome! Eiji wa in kya de wotaku de binbōdakedo tanin ni taisuru omoiyari no kimochi o wasurenai sunaona shōnen. Son'na eiji mo akogareru shachō reijō aoi-san ga aru hi, eiji no jitaku o otozure, totsujotoshite eiji to no kon'yaku o tsugeruga….
description.ru: Эйдзи — старшеклассник, живущий со своим отцом, неудачливым писателем. Он застенчивый, отаку, бедный, но честный мальчик, который никогда не забывает о сострадании к другим, как его научила покойная мать. Он тоскует по Аой, дочери президента крупной компании. Однако, Эйдзи не может смотреть Аой в глаза из-за огромного несоответствия между ней и им самим. Однажды после школы Аой приветствует Эйдзи, когда тот приходит домой. Аой говорит удивленному Эйдзи одну удивительную вещь...
description.pt-br: Eiji é um estudante do ensino médio que vive com seu pai, um romancista malsucedido. Ele é um baita nerd, e mesmo sendo pobre é um menino obediente que não esquece a compaixão alheia que sua falecida mãe lhe ensinou. Aoi, filha do presidente de uma grande empresa, admira essa idade. No entanto, Eiji não conseguia nem olhar para a enorme disparidade consigo mesmo. Depois da escola um dia, Aoi cumprimenta Eiji quando ela chega em casa. Eiji fica surpreso quando Aoi lhe diz uma palavra de surpresa...

description.en:
Taiyo Asano is a super shy high school student and the only person he can talk to is his childhood friend, Mutsumi Yozakura. It turns out that Mutsumi is the daughter of the ultimate spy family! Even worse, Mutsumi is being harassed by her overprotective, nightmare of a brother, Kyoichiro. What drastic steps will Taiyo have to take to save Mutsumi?! A spy family comedy - the mission begins!

---

description.de: An der Mikado Highschool werden die besten Studenten zu den aller besten Leibwächtern ausgebildet. Morito Hayama, ein angehender Leibwächter ohne Rang, bekommt plötzlich eine Person zugewiesen, die so wichtig ist, dass bisher kein Leibwächter, der sie beschützen sollte, überlebt hat. Wird Morito dieser Herausforderung gewachsen sein?
description.en: Mikado High School trains the best students to be the best mercenary bodyguards. But Morito Hayama, a merc escort student with no rank whatsoever, is suddenly assigned to guard a person so highly valued that no escort has ever survived before. Will his subject survive the experience? Will he survive?!

description.de:
Die Jagd nach dem Ainu-Gold hat begonnen…

Wir schreiben das frühe 20. Jahrhundert, kurz nach dem russisch-japanischen Krieg. Hoch im verschneiten Norden Japans schlägt sich ein einzelner Mann durch die Wildnis. Sein Name: Sugimoto, der Unsterbliche. Geplagt von den Erinnerungen an den Krieg versucht er, sein mageres Einkommen durch Goldschürferei aufzubessern – ohne Erfolg.

Aber dann erfährt er von einem riesigen Goldschatz, der einst den Ainu gestohlen wurde. Der einzige Hinweis: eine Schatzkarte, eintätowiert auf die Rücken zahlreicher Gefängnisinsassen, die sich nun auf der Flucht befinden. Gemeinsam mit dem Ainu-Mädchen Asirpa bricht Sugimoto auf die tödlichste Schatzsuche der Geschichte auf. Denn wer dieses Gold jagt, ist bereit, über Leichen zu gehen…

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.en:
In the early twentieth century, Russo-Japanese War veteran Saichi “Immortal” Sugimoto scratches out a meager existence during the postwar gold rush in the wilderness of Hokkaido. When he stumbles across a map to a fortune in hidden Ainu gold, he sets off on a treacherous quest to find it. But Sugimoto is not the only interested party, and everyone who knows about the gold will kill to possess it! Faced with the harsh conditions of the northern wilderness, ruthless criminals and rogue Japanese soldiers, Sugimoto will need all his skills and luck—and the help of an Ainu girl named Asirpa - to survive.

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
description.es:
Año 37 de la era Meiji. Tras sobrevivir a la guerra Ruso-Japonesa, Sugimoto, apodado “el Inmortal”, se une a la fiebre del oro para ayudar a la viuda de uno de sus amigos caído durante el conflicto. En su búsqueda, alguien le revela que existe un tesoro escondido y que las distintas claves para encontrarlo las llevan tatuadas en sus espaldas peligrosos convictos prófugos. En su camino se topará con Asirpa, quien no solo le salva la vida, sino que además le ayudará a sobrevivir en la dura tundra salvaje. ¡La carrera por hacerse con el tesoro ha comenzado!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Official French Translation](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.fr:
Saichi Sugimoto est une véritable légende de la guerre russo-japonaise du début du XXe siècle. Surnommé «l'Immortel,» il a survécu aux pires batailles menées dans les régions les plus sauvages qui soient. Mais quand le conflit se termine, il se retrouve seul et sans le sou… C'est alors qu'il apprend l'existence d'un fabuleux trésor de 75 kilos d'or accumulé par les Aïnous, peuple autochtone vivant en harmonie avec la nature. Hélas, le magot a été volé, puis caché par un homme désormais enfermé dans la pire prison d'Hokkaido. Les seuls indices menant au butin sont de mystérieux tatouages inscrits sur la peau de criminels évadés…

Pour Sugimoto, la chasse au trésor est lancée… Cependant, seul, il a peu de chances de s'en sortir. À peine sa quête commence-t-elle qu’il manque de se faire déchiqueter par un ours brun! Il ne doit la vie qu'à l'intervention providentielle d'Ashirpa, jeune indigène liée aux propriétaires légitimes du butin. Ils décident de faire équipe pour affronter les nombreux dangers qui les guettent sur la route de l'or des Aïnous…

Maintes fois primé au Japon, *Golden Kamui* est un formidable mélange d'aventure en milieu hostile et de découverte culturelle, le tout porté par une intrigue aux rebondissements multiples. Laissez-vous entraîner dans cette quête épique à travers les immensités sauvages d'Hokkaido!

---
- Winner of the 9th Manga Taisho Award in 2016.
- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.
* While the serialization is complete at 314 chapters, **the final volume is *not* out until 17/06/2022, so this series is still considered to be ongoing.**

---
[Traduction française officielle](http://www.ki-oon.com/mangas/minisite-574-golden-kamui-l-histoire.html)
description.it:
Nel pieno dell’Era Meiji Saichi Sugimoto, ex soldato d’élite sopravvissuto a una delle battaglie più sanguinose della guerra Russo-Giapponese, lasciato l’esercito ha ormai un solo obiettivo: la corsa all’oro. È questa a portarlo in Hokkaido, l’estremo nord del Giappone abitato dal misterioso popolo degli Ainu e dove secondo una leggenda qualcuno ha nascosto una enorme quantità del prezioso metallo giallo… ma Sugimoto non è l’unico a seguire le tracce che portano al tesoro nascosto e per trovarlo dovrà affrontare spietate bande di criminali, l’esercito e il clima proibitivo dell’Hokkaido con l’aiuto di una giovane e decisa Ainu in cerca di vendetta.

---
In Hokkaido, la regione più a nord del Giappone, Sugimoto è sopravvissuto alla guerra russo-giapponese dell'epoca Meiji. Soprannominato durante la guerra "l'invincibile Sugimoto", adesso inizia la sua corsa all'oro alla ricerca delle ricchezze che gli permetteranno di salvare la moglie di un suo commilitone morto durante la guerra. Durante la ricerca s'imbatte in alcuni indizi che lasciano presagire l'esistenza una riserva d'oro gestita da criminali corrotti. Accompagnato da una ragazza Ainu che ha salvato la sua vita messa alla prova dal terribile clima del nord, i due iniziano la loro avventura contro i criminali.

description.ja:
『不死身の杉元』日露戦争での鬼神の如き武功から、そう謳われた兵士は、ある目的の為に大金を欲し、かつてゴールドラッシュに沸いた北海道へ足を踏み入れる。そこにはアイヌが隠した莫大な埋蔵金への手掛かりが!?　立ち塞がる圧倒的な大自然と凶悪な死刑囚。そして、アイヌの少女、エゾ狼との出逢い。『黄金を巡る生存競争』開幕ッ!!!!

description.pt:
Após feitos dignos de um guerreiro na Guerra Russo-Japonesa, o soldado conhecido como “Sugimoto, o imortal” vai para Hokkaido, onde houve a corrida do ouro, em busca de uma grande quantia de dinheiro para realizar certo objetivo. Ali, encontra pistas que levam a um grande tesouro escondido pelos ainus, mas ele precisa enfrentar também a natureza selvagem opressiva e prisioneiros violentos, assim como conhece uma garota ainu e um raro lobo-de-hokkaido. Tem início a luta pela sobrevivência em busca do ouro!!!

description.ru:
На Хоккайдо, далеко, в северных землях Японии, живёт Сугимото, переживший русско-японскую войну, и прозванный на ней Бессмертный Сугимото. Теперь он ищет богатства, обещанные золотой лихорадкой, в надежде спасти овдовевшую жену своего покойного товарища. Во время своей охоты на золото, он находит намеки на скрытый золотой склад преступников. Вместе с девушкой айну, которая некогда спасла его, они отважились на смертельное приключение против преступников, в поисках золотого тайника.

---

- Nominated for the 20th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize and 40th Kodansha Manga Awards that same year.
- Winner of the 22th Tezuka Osamu Cultural Prize in 2018.

description.tr:
Sugimoto, Meiji Dönemi'nde, Japonya'nın kuzeyindeki Hokkaido'da meydana gelen Rus-Japon Savaşından sağ olarak kurtulur. Savaş boyunca "Ölümsüz Sugimoto" olarak anılan bu adam, şimdilerde savaşta ölen arkadaşının karısını kurtarma ümidi ile altınla gelen vaat edilmiş zenginliğin peşine düşer. Bu altın avcılığı süresince, yozlaşmış suçluların sakladığı altın gömüsüyle alakalı ipuçları bulur. Kötü iklim şartlarında hayatını kurtaran Auni'li bir kızla ortak olarak, altını arayan amansız suçlulara karşı ölüm-kalım mücadelesine girerler.

description.uk:
Далеко, на північних землях Хоккайдо, ветеран російсько-японської війни, за прізвиськом Суґімото "Безмертний", вирушив на пошуки багатств, обіцяні золотою лихоманкою. Загиблий товариш благав попіклуватись Сайчі про його хвору дружину, що терміново потребує гроші на лікування. Під час свого чергового невдалого полювання на золото, старий п'яниця розбовтує колишньому солдату про таємничий скарб айну, який викрав та сховав невідомий злодій. Натрапивши на слід "Безсмертний" Суґімото Сайчі розпочинає смертельну гонку з дівчинкою айну, на ім’я Асірпа.

description.vi:
Tại Hokkaido, hòn đảo xa miền cực bắc của nhật bản, nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Sugimoto Saichi trở về từ cuộc chiến tranh Nga Nhật thời kì Minh Trị. Với biệt danh "Sugimoto Bất Tử" trong chiến tranh, anh lao vào chạy theo cơn sốt vàng nhằm thực hiện ý nguyện của người bạn thân đã mất trong trận chiến

---

description.pt-br: Em Hokkaido, nas terras do extremo norte do Japão, Sugimoto sobreviveu à guerra russo-japonesa da era Meiji. Apelidado de "Sugimoto, o Imortal" durante a guerra, ele agora procura as riquezas prometidas pela corrida do ouro, na esperança de salvar a esposa viúva de seu falecido companheiro da guerra. Durante a sua caça ao ouro, ele descobre sobre um estoque enorme de ouro escondido por um criminoso. Através de uma parceria com uma garota da tribo Ainu, que salva a sua vida, ele luta contra os criminosos, os militares, e a própria natureza para encontrar o tesouro!
description.zh-hk:
被稱為『不死身的杉元』、在日俄戰爭中有如鬼神般的殺敵， 被世人如此熟知的杉元佐一， 為了得到大量的黃金，來到了昔日淘金熱潮盛行的北海道。 於某次機遇下，他得知了隱藏著愛奴人龐大財寶的線索!? 在充滿威嚴的大自然中， 和許多兇惡的死刑犯、以及愛奴少女相遇， 『尋找黃金的生存競爭』正式開幕!!!

description.en: Villains who couldn't kill him when he was a hero and put him in prison. Now he is a prison guard and carries out executions with his own hands.
description.ko: 히어로 시절에 죽이지 못하고 감옥에 수감시켜 놓았던 빌런들. 이제는 교도관이 되어 자신의 손으로 사형을 집행한다.

title.en: Issho ni Kurashite ii desu ka?

altTitles.ja: 一緒に暮らしていいですか？

description.en: Hiromi Sonoda has no girlfriend, no job, and no home, until he finds a shared-house with very cheap rent and goes to check it out. However, the share-house has a certain condition... Kei Sasuga presents a new "Share House Romantic Comedy"!
description.fr:
Hiromi Sonoda n'a plus de petite amie, plus de travail et plus de maison, jusqu'à ce qu'il trouve une colocation au loyer très bon marché et qu'il aille la visiter. Cependant, la colocation est soumise à certaines conditions...
Kei Sasuga présente sa nouvelle "Share House Romantic Comedy" !
description.id: Hiromi Sonoda tidak punya pacar, tidak punya pekerjaan, dan tidak punya rumah, sampai dia menemukan rumah kos-kosan dengan harga sewa yang sangat murah dan pergi untuk melihatnya. Namun, rumah kos-kosan memiliki syarat tertentu... Kei Sasuga menghadirkan "Komedi Romantis Rumah Kos-kosan" baru!
description.ja: 「幸せな家庭」を夢見る園田寛美は、職を失い同棲中の彼女に振られて、家ナシ金ナシ彼女ナシに…。そんなときに、間違えて入居したのが、なんと女性専用シェアハウスだった!!
description.pt-br: Hiromi é um homem que sempre sonhou em ter uma família calorosa e amorosa por causa de um incidente em seu passado. Entretanto, depois que sua namorada terminou com ele por várias razões, ele começa a desistir de seu sonho e pensa que nunca será capaz de realizá-lo. Sem um lugar para viver, ele chega a uma casa compartilhada cheia de mulheres. Será que ele vai encontrar o lar e a família que ele almeja neste novo lugar?

altTitles.ja: 青春プロタゴニスト 僕たちは恋愛過剰

altTitles.ja-ro: Seishun Protagonist: Boku-tachi wa Ren'ai Kajou

description.en:
"Every person is the protagonist of his or her own life. But how many of us can truly live. How many of us can truly be the hero of our own lives?" Youth Protagonist.

This is a love story about a high school boy who thinks he is incapable of love for one reason or another, and a girl classmate who falls in love with him.
description.pt-br:
“Cada pessoa é protagonista de sua própria vida. Mas quantos de nós podem viver verdadeiramente? Quantos de nós podem ser verdadeiramente o herói de nossas próprias vidas?” Protagonista Juvenil.

Esta é uma história de amor sobre um estudante do ensino médio que acredita ser incapaz de amar por uma razão ou outra, e uma colega de classe que se apaixona por ele.

altTitles.es-la: El Camino a Casa Después de la Escuela

altTitles.pt-br: Viagem para casa depois da escola

description.en: Shun was invited to the Going-Home Club by Naoki Satou, also known as "Chokki-chan". Despite refusing, he ends up being somewhat forcefully involved in the club's activities! A Going Home Club rom-com featuring a detour-loving high school girl and a new high school student who has lost his dream.
description.ja:
佐藤直希こと“直帰ちゃん”から帰宅部に勧誘された瞬。断ったのに、半ば強引な形で活動に参加させられるハメに！ 寄り道大好き女子高生と夢を失った新入生が紡ぐ帰宅部ラブコメディ！

---

Satō Naoki koto “chokki-chan” kara kitaku-bu ni kan'yū sa reta Shun. Kotowatta no ni, nakaba gōin'na katachi de katsudō ni sanka sa se rareru hame ni! Yorimichi daisuki mesukōsei to yume o ushinatta shin'nyūsei ga tsumugu kitaku-bu rabukomedi!
description.es-la: Shun fue invitado al Club de Irse a Casa por Naoki Satou, también conocida como "Chokki-chan". A pesar de negarse, acaba involucrándose a la fuerza en las actividades del club. Una comedia romántica del Club de Irse a Casa protagonizada por una chica de preparatoria amante de los desvíos y un nuevo estudiante de preparatoria que ha perdido su sueño.

altTitles.ja-ro: 可愛くないね、後輩くん

description.en:
"You're really not cute!!!"  
  
Akutsu is still only an underclassman but he's got all the girls' attention. Plus, not only is he good in his studies, he's also the ace of the baseball club.  
  
Even though Ida doesn't want have anything to do with Akutsu but somehow they're often together…?  
  
Don't tell me he actually likes me!?
